name: Avatar of Death
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned , unconscious
languages: all languages known to its summoner

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement.
descriptions: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

special_abilities.name: Turning Immunity.
descriptions: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

special_abilities.name: Hit Points.
descriptions: The Avatar of Death appears with hit points equal to half its summoner's maximum hit points.

actions.name: Reaping Scythe.
descriptions: The avatar sweeps its spectral scythe through a creature within 5 feet of it, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.
